Congresswoman Gabrielle Giffords at a makeshift memorial outside the hospital in Tucson, Arizona, on January 10. Senator Kirsten Gillibrand said Sunday that the US lawmaker shot in the head in Arizona last week "is doing great" and making progress every day. Kirsten Gillibrand , a close friend of Democratic congresswoman Gabrielle Giffords , has visited the lawmaker in her hospital room and is in close contact with her astronaut husband Mark Kelson , she told NBC's "Meet The Press."
